integrations.accountings.debitoor.descri: Tired of late customer payments? Now you can get paid within minutes by giving your customers a comfortable and secure way to accept PayPal, credit card, direct debit, or SOFORTüberweisung directly through Debitoor invoice. It only takes you a few minutes and is free of charge.
integrations.accountings.debitoor.title: PayPal
integrations.communications.device-payme: With the Device Payments Plugin on payever you can manage payment process by SMS messages
integrations.communications.qr.descripti: QR let you easily convert links into convenient visual representation
integrations.communications.qr.title: QR
integrations.communications.twilio.descr: With Twilio inside payever you can send SMS to your customers for differnet purposes. Let them pay via payever Point of Sale directly on their phone or send marketing offers. Everything is easy and simple to use.
integrations.communications.twilio.title: Twilio
integrations.debitoor.description: Tired of late customer payments? Now you can get paid within minutes by giving your customers a comfortable and secure way to accept PayPal, credit card, direct debit, or SOFORTüberweisung directly through Debitoor invoice. It only takes you a few minutes and is free of charge.
integrations.payments.cash.description: Offer your customers the most established and for businesses most secure payment option. Customers transfer money directly to your bank account. Once you´ve received the money you ship the goods.
integrations.payments.cash.price: No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.cash.title: Wire transfer
integrations.payments.payex_creditcard.d: With PayEx inside payever you can accept credit cards. Enable your customers to pay via credit cards inside your online shop.
integrations.payments.payex_creditcard.p: No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.payex_faktura.desc:
Santander Invoice inside payever is the easiest way for your customers to pay online:

1. Customer enters his SSN number
2. Waits a few seconds
3. Gets approved and received the goods

FOR BUSINESSES

- You have no risk and get fully covered by Santander
- Ship goods directly after the approval to your customers
- Fair pricing

FOR CUSTOMERS

- Receive goods without entering payment data or paying upfront
- A fair reminder system without direct fees
- No risk by entering data or paying upfront
integrations.payments.payex_faktura.pric: No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.paypal.description: PayPal is the faster, safer way for your customers to make an online payment to your merchant account. Connect your PayPal account with payever with one simple login. It takes you seconds and you can directly accept PayPal payments for all channels including your Shop, Checkout, Point of Sale or Marketing.
integrations.payments.paypal.price: No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.paypal.title: PayPal
integrations.payments.santander_ccp_inst: Santander Comfort Card Plus enables installment payments with a physical card. Your customers get in addition to the installment payment that generally happens one time an option to finance goods many times in the future.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.santander_factorin: Santander Installment Factoring is the easiest way to accept installments inside any channel of payever. Your customers don´t need to go to a postal office and can finish the installment within seconds.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.santander_installm: With Santander installment inside payever you can accept part payments. Raise the average size of your baskets by offering this payment option to your customers.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
With Santander installment inside payever you can accept part payments and Buy Now Pay Later payments. Raise the average size of your baskets by offering this payment option to your customers.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
With Santander installment inside payever you can accept part payments and Buy Now Pay Later payments. Raise the average size of your baskets by offering this payment option to your customers.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.

With Santander installment inside payever you can accept part payments starting as low as 99€ and without limits up. Raise the average size of your baskets by offering this payment option to your customers. Online and at the Point of Sale.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.santander_invoice_: Santander Invoice inside payever is the easiest way for your customers to pay online.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
Santander Invoice inside payever is the easiest way for your customers to pay online.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.santander_pos_fact: Santander Installment Factoring POS is the easiest way to accept installments inside any channel of payever. Your customers don´t need to go to a postal office and can finish the installment within seconds.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.santander_pos_inst: With Santander installment at the Point of Sale inside payever you can accept part payments. Raise the average size of your baskets when customers shop in your local store  by offering this payment option to your customers.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.

With Santander installment inside payever you can accept part payments starting as low as 99€ and without limits up. Raise the average size of your baskets by offering this payment option to your customers. Online and at the Point of Sale.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.santander_pos_invo:
Santander Invoice POS inside payever is the easiest way for your customers to pay online:

1. Customer leaves address and birthday information
2. Waits a few seconds
3. Gets approved and received the goods

FOR BUSINESSES

- You have no risk and get fully covered by Santander
- Ship goods directly after the approval to your customers
- Fair pricing

FOR CUSTOMERS

- Receive goods without entering payment data or paying upfront
- A fair reminder system without direct fees
- No risk by entering data or paying upfront
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.sofort.description: Sofortüberweisung enables your customers to securely transfer you money directly during the payment process as a payment option. Accept payments in any channel and get safe payments directly into your business bank account.
integrations.payments.sofort.price: No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.sofort.title: SOFORT Banking
integrations.payments.stripe_directdebit: With Stripe Direct Debit inside payever you can accept SEPA direct debit within minutes: Just create an online account leaving a few information about you and your business. After that you can already accept payments in every selling channel. It´s the easier and fastest way to accept direct debit payments.
No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.stripe.description: With Stripe inside payever you can accept credit cards within minutes: Just create an online account leaving a few information about you and your business. After that you can already accept payments in every selling channel. It´s the easier and fastest way to accept credit card payments.
integrations.payments.stripe.price: No monthly fees. Pay per transaction.
integrations.payments.stripe.title: Stripe Credit Card
integrations.products.amazon.description: Connect your Amazon account with payever with a simple login. It takes you seconds, but allows you to synchronize your offers back and forth.
integrations.products.amazon.title: Amazon
integrations.products.ebay.description: eBay is one of the biggest online marketplaces, which enables you to reach many potential customers. Connect your eBay account with payever with a simple login. It takes you seconds, but allows you to synchronize your offers back and forth.
integrations.products.ebay.title: eBay
integrations.products.google_shopping.de: Connect your Google account with payever with a simple login. It takes you seconds, but allows you to synchronize your offers back and forth.
integrations.shopsystems.api.description: The application programming interface (API), controls the way payever applications communicate with your eCommerce platform or webpage.
integrations.shopsystems.api.title: API
integrations.shopsystems.dandomain.descr: With the DanDomain Plugin on payever you can accept all payever Checkout payments inside your DanDomain shop.
